attributes.action: MPS to be accountable and respond to public pressure
attributes.additional_details:
Proposals:

1 EU for trade only come out of employment movement.

2 Focus on health education transport

3 No more involvement in wars and come out of USA special arrangements

4 No speed cameras on motor ways

5 No toll on Dartford crossing

6 Spend on pot hole repair

7 Cycles to be confined to wide roads
